## Deployment Instructions

### Quick Deploy

```powershell
cd infra/bicep/{project-name}
./deploy.ps1
```

### Preview Changes (What-If)

```powershell
./deploy.ps1 -WhatIf
```

### Custom Parameters

```powershell
./deploy.ps1 `
    -ResourceGroupName "rg-{project}-{env}" `
    -Location "{location}" `
    -Environment "{env}"
```
